title: Hartlepool
summary: Hartlepool (/ˈhɑːrtlɪpuːl/) is a large port town in County Durham, North East England. It is the largest settlement and administrative centre of the Borough of Hartlepool. The town is located 32 miles (51 km) south-east of Newcastle upon Tyne, 17 miles (27 km) south-east of Durham, 20 miles (32 km) south-east of Sunderland, and 12 miles (19 km) north-east of Stockton-on-Tees.
